```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(TE.Report)
library(devEMF)

library(lubridate)
library(xlsx)

fig_type <- 'png'

```


## Define Queries

```{r data_range, results='hide', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

key_fun <- date_range
#key_fun <- dated_three_monthly_lookback

trader   <- 11
query.js <- key_fun(trader, as.Date('2016-10-01'), today())
colnames(query.js) <- c("TraderID", "start", "end")

trader   <- 70
query.ba <- key_fun(trader, as.Date('2016-10-01'), today())
colnames(query.ba) <- c("TraderID", "start", "end")


trader   <- 101
query.dk <- key_fun(trader, as.Date('2016-10-01'), today())
colnames(query.dk) <- c("TraderID", "start", "end")

```


## Trigger Report Computation

```{r extended_trades, results="hide", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
report.js <- new("RiskReviewReportCoreFactors")
report.js <- dataRequest(report.js, query.js)
report.js <- Process(report.js)

report.ba <- new("RiskReviewReportCoreFactors")
report.ba <- dataRequest(report.ba, query.ba)
report.ba <- Process(report.ba)

report.dk <- new("RiskReviewReportCoreFactors")
report.dk <- dataRequest(report.dk, query.dk)
report.dk <- Process(report.dk)

```


## Risk Plots
#BA
```{r plot_focus_ba, dev=fig_type, fig.ext=fig_type, dpi = 300, fig.width=13, fig.height=15}
plt_list <- getOutputGGPlotList(report.ba)

for (plot in plt_list) {
  plot(plot)
}

analyzer <- getOutputObjectList(report.ba)[["PortfolioInstrumentCoreFactorsMCTR"]]
data <- getReferenceData(analyzer)
write.xlsx2(data, "BA.Factor_MCTR.xlsx")
```
